text:
Hargh,
Is there any other way to get a proxy redirect's URL other than accessing `request.referrer` ?

Thanks, have a good day, the computer is your friend

Hello everyone, I'm writing to you because we can't find the information in the HubSpot API.
We want to send an email to several recipients via the HubSpot api using a template defined in HubSpot. The particularity is that we want to dynamically modify some information of the email (image, text, content...) with variables.
How to pass variables in an email template via the API to retrieve them in the template and interpret them? We can't find anything on the subject except Hubl variables which are data stored in HubSpot but nothing for external variables. Can you help me? Thanks in advance.

Hi all! Wondering if someone could point me in the right direction. We want to build our blog landing page to have a subscribe block that's interjected into the listings like this example.

How would you go about doing this? Would you build 2 different sections and have the section section offset by 2 posts? I assume there's a way to do this with HubSpot?
I'd check which iteration of the listing contents loop is running and if it is the third one insert the subscribe block as well as the third listing item.
is it just me or is HubSpot being really slow at the moment?
Anyone else running into issues with HubSpot loading?
